title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu does not consistently close all the open editors.
EB: It should close all the open editors without saving any changes that have been made.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new file f1.txt. 
2. Open multiple editors. 
3. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
